section.p:
Add will schedule files and directories to your working copy. They will be uploaded and added to the repository on your next commit.
How to add file(s):
1. Select an unversioned file(s) in Solution Explorer. An unversioned file has a ( ) status icon in front of the file.
2. Right click the selected unversioned file(s).
3. Select Add from the menu.
Notice that the status symbol has changed in front of the file(s) added in Solution Explorer from
to
Ankhs output window will show all the file(s) that has been added to the working copy.
NOTE: If you add something and change your mind before committing, you can unschedule the addition using the revert command. This will change the item back to an unrevisioned item.
